alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Campbell County through 530 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Savageton, or 30 miles northwest of Wright, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savageton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
